```{R}
# Libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(ggmap)
library(tidyverse)

# First Basic Map of Bude
gc1 <- geocode("bude, western england")

map <- get_map(gc1, zoom = 14)
ggmap(map) +
  geom_point(
    aes(x = lon, y = lat),
    data = gc1, color = "red", size = 3
  )
```

```{R}
# Road Map of Bude
map.r <- get_map("Bude", maptype = "road", zoom = 12)
ggmap(map.r)
```

```{R}
# Water Map of Bude
map.w <- get_map("Bude", maptype = "watercolor", zoom = 12)
ggmap(map.w)
```

```{R}
# Map with Route from Cricket Grounds to The Brendon Arms
r <- route(from = "bude north cornwall cricket grounds", to = "the brendon arms", mode = "walking", structure = "legs", output = "simple", alternatives = FALSE, units = "metric", messaging = FALSE,
  urlonly = FALSE, override_limit = FALSE, ext = "com", inject = "")
ggmap(map) +
  geom_path(
    aes(x = startLon, y = startLat),
    data = r, color = "red", size = 2
  )+
  geom_point(
    aes(x = lon, y = lat),
    data = gc6, color = "brown", size = 3
  )+
  geom_point(
    aes(x = lon, y = lat),
    data = gc7, color = "black", size = 3
  )
```
